attributes.action: Get the media more involved with missing people( primetimetv shows)
attributes.additional_details:
Too many people in the uk are going missing, and not enough is been done about it, we have crimewatch to help get the bad guys so why not one to help find the missing?

We need a show on primetime to help get the nation involved of finding these people of many ages, insted of wasting the slots on fake people like big brother.

We could also do with papers having a page with missing people in that changes daily/weekly

same for radio stations could have a segment on finding the missing people nation wide by giving out helpful links and so on.
